snippet: On National Geographic Channel, shows like “Evacuate Earth,” “The Mayan Apocalypse 2012” and “Maya Underworld” are commandeering the schedule as the holidays near.
abstract: Mike Hale observes National Geographic Channel has eschewed normal holiday programming to broadcast doomsday shows like Evacuate Earth, The Mayan Apocalypse 2012 and Maya Underworld, which focus on end of world predicted by Mayan calendar.
lead_paragraph: On National Geographic Channel, shows like “Evacuate Earth,” “The Mayan Apocalypse 2012” and “Maya Underworld” are commandeering the schedule as the holidays near.

headline.seo: On National Geographic Channel, No End in Sight for Doom
headline.main: No End in Sight for Doomsaying
headline.print_headline: No End in Sight for Doomsaying
